description.p: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

When you hit a creature with a ranged attack using this weapon, you can force the target to make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is Frightened of you until the end of your next turn. In addition, you gain an extra +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls against creatures that are Frightened.
This simple quarterstaff can be combined with its separate head by using a free action and speaking its command word. The weapon is magical for purposes of overcoming damage reduction.

Transformation: As a free action, you can speak the command word to attach or detach the weapon head, transforming this quarterstaff into a {{parent}} or back into a quarterstaff. The weapon retains its magical properties in any form.
Magical Weapon: Attack and damage rolls made with this weapon are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and damage.
